trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeViewDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.
Displays a dialog box to edit the line images for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
The data bound control.
Displays a dialog box to edit the data bindings.
Displays a dialog box to edit the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The markup used to render the control at design time.
Retrieves the HTML markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, provides for custom initialization of the given <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> property for the control contained in the control designer.
